con:request.name: AssessPaymentMethod
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Request" xmlns:rad1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Fees.Request"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:AssessPaymentMethodFees> <!--Optional:--> <tem:AssessPaymentMethodFeesRequest> <rad:SecurityGUID>${#TestSuite#securityToken}</rad:SecurityGUID> <rad:CarrierCodes> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <rad:CarrierCode><rad:AccessibleCarrierCode>${#TestSuite#carriercode}</rad:AccessibleCarrierCode></rad:CarrierCode> </rad:CarrierCodes> <!--Optional:--> <rad:ClientIPAddress>${empty}</rad:ClientIPAddress> <!--Optional:--> <rad:HistoricUserName>${empty}</rad:HistoricUserName> <rad1:PaymentsToAssessFee> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <rad1:PaymentToAssessFee> <rad1:PaymentMethod>${#TestSuite#PaymentMethod}</rad1:PaymentMethod> <!--Optional:--> <rad1:PaymentMethodType>${empty}</rad1:PaymentMethodType> <rad1:CardNumber>${empty}</rad1:CardNumber> <rad1:PaymentAmount>${#TestCase#Balance}</rad1:PaymentAmount> </rad1:PaymentToAssessFee> </rad1:PaymentsToAssessFee> </tem:AssessPaymentMethodFeesRequest> </tem:AssessPaymentMethodFees> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
